titleStmt.title: A Reprimand to bigotism, or, Reflections on the several letters of a book called The Mistery of phanaticism wherein the dissenters are vindicated from the calumnies and whims of the author of that book.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: t.p. stained and torn; beginning-page 11 from defective Huntington Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
